last_episode_to_air.name: Fight The Man, Kill The Plan
last_episode_to_air.overview: With Honey gone, Candy decides to go solo. Harry falls in love with Coco and rethinks being a corporate hatchet man. Rusty and Clark enlist the citizens of East Plains to fight Pentalode. In a surprise move, Farnsworth announces his retirement and appoints his successors. Valerie finds a new career.

name: Fairwood
overview: Two quirky entertainers with an upbeat, family-oriented philosophy are unexpectedly thrust into the limelight as hosts of their own TV show just as an evil corporation begins taking over their small town.

episodes.name: Meet The Fairwoods
episodes.overview: Takeover specialist Valerie Stanton arrives at a rustic TV station with a plan to wrest control from its founder. Musicians Rusty and Clark Fairwood are nagged by their grandparents to start thinking about their future, but they're a surprise hit when they open for country superstars Candy & Honey.

episodes.name: Television Will Never Be The Same
episodes.overview: Valerie and the Pentalode hatchet man discover an untapped energy source beneath the station, and the Channel 29 IT guy worries it will be exploited. A popular Channel 29 talk show host quits, and a staffer enlists Rusty and Clark to take over the show. Candy and Honey grapple with the paparazzi.

episodes.name: There's Something Funny In The Wind
episodes.overview: Candy and Honey hide from the press at Rusty and Clark’s house. Mitsy Maxine, the 16-year-old CEO of Pentalode, pressures Valerie and Harry to liquidate Channel 29. Jealous of Rusty and Clark's TV show, Bo and Joe Kowalski vow to get on the air, too.

episodes.name: The Plot Invariably Thickens
episodes.overview: Rusty and Clark’s popularity booms. Coco digs into Pentalode’s corrupt history to discover what Valerie and Harry are up to. Valerie orders a Pentalode scientist to interrogate the staff about the energy source. Clark goes on a date, and Honey tells Candy she's thinking about leaving the band.

episodes.name: Hearts Are Full And Love Is Nigh
episodes.overview: Honey leaves, and Candy finds comfort in the arms of a local TV chef. To boost ratings, Valerie tries to turn the Fairwood Brothers into rap stars. Spooner stumbles upon Pentalode's plans to exploit the energy source and rip off the locals. Farnsworth is shocked to learn about the plot.

episodes.name: Fight The Man, Kill The Plan
episodes.overview: With Honey gone, Candy decides to go solo. Harry falls in love with Coco and rethinks being a corporate hatchet man. Rusty and Clark enlist the citizens of East Plains to fight Pentalode. In a surprise move, Farnsworth announces his retirement and appoints his successors. Valerie finds a new career.
